answerText: "The Cry of the Children"[10] This poet of "A Musical Instrument" and Sonnets from the Portuguese wrote "The Cry of the Children."
heading: SUBMIT |2014 | Harvard A, UVA B | 7 | Literature | British | College
subject: Literature
question: Question:  [10] Name this poem, which observes a certain group "weeping in the playtime of the others, / in the country of the free."
